DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , open-label , randomize crossover trial compare two treatment , Alprazolam ODT versus conventional alprazolam tablet , subject already take conventional immediate-release alprazolam tablet anxiety . The trial include five study visit ( four period 7 3 -day duration ) : Screening ( Visit 1 ) , Treatment Period 1 ( Visit 2 ) , Treatment Period 2 ( Visit 3 ) , Final Visit ( Visit 4 ) , Follow-up ( Visit 5 [ telephone visit ] ) . At Visit 1 , follow screening , eligible subject continue take conventional alprazolam prescribe physician . At Visit 2 , eligible subject randomize approximately equal number one two treatment sequence : Alprazolam ODT/ conventional alprazolam conventional alprazolam/ Alprazolam ODT . Subjects continue take alprazolam accordance treatment sequence assign , dose regimen prescribe alprazolam . At Visit 3 , subject cross alternate treatment Visit 4 . At Visit 4 , subject complete Subject Preference Questionnaire , physical examination clinical laboratory test perform . At end Visit 4 , subject resume take conventional alprazolam . The site make follow-up telephone call 7 - 3 day Visit 4 ass subject 's health status .
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter , Open-Label , Randomized Crossover Trial Assess Subject Preference Alprazolam Orally Disintegrating Tablets Compared Conventional Alprazolam Tablets Subjects With Anxiety
DOC.detailed_description: See approve Package Insert Adverse Event information .
